Class Customer

java.lang.Object
Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Customer class

This class represents a customer. It holds a constructor for creating a customer object. This class also holds getters and setters for retrieval and modification of a customer object.

Since:
Corretto-17
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tiarnaigh Downey-Webb. MMU ID: 19092488.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String businessName, CustomerAddress address, String telephoneNumber)
      Customer constructor Constructs an instance of theCustomer class as a customer objectwith required values. CustomerID is not required as the database will assign and autoincrement customer ID.
      Parameters:
      businessName - A string containing the customer's business name.
      address - An address instance containing the customer's address details.
      telephoneNumber - A string containing the customer's telephone number.

  • Method Details

    • getCustomerID

      public int getCustomerID()
      getCustomerID() A getter which retrieves CustomerID from a customer object after it has been set using a setter.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the CustomerID of the customer.

    • setCustomerID

      public void setCustomerID(int CustomerID)
      setCustomerID() A setter which sets the CustomerID of a customer in the database.
      Type Parameters:
      code - CustomerID. An integer representing the CustomerID of a customer.

    • getBusinessName

      public String getBusinessName()
      getBusinessName() A getter which retrieves the businessName from a customer object.
      Returns:
      A String representing the businessName of the customer.

    • setBusinessName

      public void setBusinessName(String businessName)
      setBusinessName() A setter which sets the businessName of a customer in the database.
      Type Parameters:
      code - businessName. A String representing the business name of a customer.

    • getTelephoneNumber

      public String getTelephoneNumber()
      getTelephoneNumber() A getter which retrieves the telephoneNumber from a customer object.
      Returns:
      A String representing the telephoneNumber of the customer.

    • setTelephoneNumber

      public void setTelephoneNumber(String telephoneNumber)
      setTelephoneNumber() A setter which sets the telephoneNumber of a customer in the database.
      Type Parameters:
      code - telephoneNumber. A String representing the telephone number of a customer.

    • getAddress

      public CustomerAddress getAddress()
      getAddress() A getter which retrieves the Address from a customer object.
      Returns:
      Address an instance of the Address class. The address of the customer.

    • customerToHTMLString

      public String customerToHTMLString()
      customerToHTMLString() Compiles customer information and converts it to HTML String for display on website as a row of a table.
      Returns:
      HTML String of customer information, including customerID, BusinessName, Address and TelephoneNumber.
